other_gear: masterwork breastplate, masterwork composite longbow (+2 Str) with 20 arrows, masterwork greatsword, masterwork warhammer, courtier's outfit, bit and bridle, light horse (combat trained), military saddle, saddlebags, studded leather barding, 1,121 gp

sections.body: During Combat The aristocrat directs her troops from horseback, saving her personal attention for the toughest foes. She uses potions of cure light wounds to save her most wounded subordinates from death.
sections.name: Tactics

sections.body: The officer is a capable and seasoned commander, and has earned the loyalty of her troops.

name: Officer
skills: Diplomacy +9, Intimidate +5, Knowledge (nobility) +5, Perception +8, Profession (soldier) +9, Ride +6, Sense Motive +5
combat_gear: potions of cure light wounds (3), potion of cure moderate wounds
